name: Safavieh_Hamilton_Beige_Recliner_Chair
reviews: This chair has virtually no padding and reclines at an awkward and uncomfortable angle. I strongly recommend you do not purchase this product
description: The modern magic of this contemporary recliner chair begins with its polished style.
